I thank my brother Sheikh Khalifa for his support and I thank the countries of the world who voted for us and thank the national teams that worked faithfully within two years to achieve the achievement.

I thank the people of the UAE for their interaction, support, enthusiasm and joy ... The small before the big .. The women before the men .. All contributed to the achievement of this achievement # Expo2020

We promised the world that we will build it in 2020. Today we are promising, and we also promise that we will achieve our motto in communicating minds to build a better future.
We want to achieve real communication through which we build a better future for the people of the region and its youth It is time for our region to regain its historical and cultural role.
Our region is a place for the convergence of civilizations, the fusion of cultures and the creation of creations. Our region will list its cultural role with initiatives of this type

RT @WilliamJHague: Congratulations to #Dubai for winning # Expo2020. We know you will do a fantastic job. #Mabruk!
We congratulate the nation, our president & all people in UAE on Dubai's winning bid to host the greatest exhibition in the world # Expo2020
I extend my thanks to HH Sheikh Khalifa for his great support, and to every country that voted for Dubai to host # Expo2020
I am proud of our teams who earned this victory for Dubai with two years of hard work, dedication and commitment. # Expo2020
To all people in the UAE: your support and enthusiasm paid our victory at Dubai # Expo2020 .Today, you are all champions
To all the Arab countries: thank you for your heartfelt encouragement. Together we now share a historical moment for our region. # Expo2020
To the world: we renew our promise to astonish you at # Expo2020 Dubai will bring to life our vision: Connecting Minds, Creating the Future.
Our goal is to build a better future for the region's youth. The UAE will achieve it through collaboration and inspiration at # Expo2020
Dubai # Expo2020 will breathe new life into the ancient role of the Middle East as a melting pot for cultures and creativity
